code:
%%{CloudNative_HelmChart}}}%%

stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-08.01 — Ethics Evaluation Flow (CloudNative_HelmChart)

[CloudNative_ServiceMesh] --> PENDING : AlignmentChecked (CloudNative_HelmChart)
note right of PENDING
  Ethics evaluation initiated  
  • triggered by new PoC or Proposal event  
  • fetch rubric and Manifesto version  
  • assign evaluator (CloudNative_K8sCluster)
end note

PENDING --> EVALUATING : EvaluationStarted
note right of EVALUATING
  Process input through multi-layer rubric:  
  • quantitative: resonance, alignment  
  • qualitative: intent, externalities  
  • hybrid AI-human scoring possible
end note

EVALUATING --> UNDER_REVIEW : ScoreComputed / RequiresHumanReview
note right of UNDER_REVIEW
  If confidence < threshold, escalate  
  • peer review or ethics board confirmation  
  • discussion / comments appended  
end note

EVALUATING --> APPROVED : EthicsPassed (CloudNative_K8sCluster)
EVALUATING --> REJECTED : EthicsFailed (CloudNative_K8sCluster)

UNDER_REVIEW --> APPROVED : Confirmed / ConsensusReached
UNDER_REVIEW --> REJECTED : EthicsViolationConfirmed

APPROVED --> ATTESTATION : AttestationIssued (CloudNative_DockerImage)
note right of ATTESTATION
  Issue ethics attestation (CloudNative_DockerImage)  
  • stored in PoCI (CloudNative_Serverless)  
  • feeds resonance scoring (CloudNative_ServiceMesh)  
  • updates metrics (CloudNative_HelmChart)
end note

ATTESTATION --> [CloudNative_ServiceMesh] : EvaluationClosed

REJECTED --> FLAGGED : FlaggedForViolation
FLAGGED --> GOV_NOTIFY : GovernanceAlertRaised (CloudNative_DockerImage)
GOV_NOTIFY --> [CloudNative_ServiceMesh] : EthicsCaseLogged

%% ---- Exceptional paths ----
PENDING --> FAILED : InvalidInput / RubricMissing
EVALUATING --> FAILED : ModelError / Timeout
FAILED --> [CloudNative_ServiceMesh] : EvaluationAborted

%% ===== Styling =====
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class PENDING,EVALUATING,UNDER_REVIEW,APPROVED,REJECTED,ATTESTATION,FLAGGED,GOV_NOTIFY,FAILED core;
repo_description: The cohersphere architecture — structural blueprint of the resonance network. Defines the modular layers connecting app, API, and governance protocols. Outlines data flows for Proof-of-Contribution, c

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 CloudNative_HelmChart 和 CloudNative_HelmChart。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'CloudNative_HelmChart 和 CloudNative_HelmChart'，你看看合适吗？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 CloudNative_K8sCluster 和 CloudNative_K8sCluster 的逻辑。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'CloudNative_K8sCluster 和 CloudNative_K8sCluster'，对吧？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 CloudNative_K8sCluster 和 CloudNative_DockerImage。

可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 CloudNative_DockerImage 和 CloudNative_Serverless 的分支。

[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 CloudNative_ServiceMesh 和 CloudNative_HelmChart 的环节。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'CloudNative_ServiceMesh 和 CloudNative_HelmChart'，对吧？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 CloudNative_DockerImage 的逻辑。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'CloudNative_DockerImage'？
可以，继续吧。
